35 template <typename T, typename A>
36 class Tensor {
37  // meaningful error if T& is not assignable, see
38  // https://gcc.gnu.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=48101
39  static_assert(
40  std::is_assignable<std::add_lvalue_reference_t<T>, T>::value,
41  "Tensor<T>: T must be an assignable type (e.g. cannot be const)");
42 
43  public:
44  typedef Tensor<T, A> Tensor_;
45  typedef Range range_type;
46  typedef typename range_type::size_type size_type;
47  typedef A allocator_type;
48  typedef
49  typename allocator_type::value_type value_type;
50  typedef
51  typename allocator_type::reference reference;
52  typedef typename allocator_type::const_reference
53  const_reference;
54  typedef typename allocator_type::pointer pointer;
55  typedef typename allocator_type::const_pointer
56  const_pointer;
57  typedef typename allocator_type::difference_type
58  difference_type;
59  typedef pointer iterator;
60  typedef const_pointer const_iterator;
61  typedef typename TiledArray::detail::numeric_type<T>::type
62  numeric_type;
63  typedef typename TiledArray::detail::scalar_type<T>::type
64  scalar_type;
65 
66  private:
67  template <typename X>
68  using numeric_t = typename TiledArray::detail::numeric_type<X>::type;
69 
71 
73  class Impl : public allocator_type {
74  public:
76 
78  Impl() : allocator_type(), range_(), data_(NULL) {}
79 
81 
83  explicit Impl(const range_type& range)
84  : allocator_type(), range_(range), data_(NULL) {
85  data_ = allocator_type::allocate(range.volume());
86  }
87 
89 
91  explicit Impl(range_type&& range)
92  : allocator_type(), range_(range), data_(NULL) {
93  data_ = allocator_type::allocate(range.volume());
94  }
95 
96  ~Impl() {
97  math::destroy_vector(range_.volume(), data_);
98  allocator_type::deallocate(data_, range_.volume());
99  data_ = NULL;
100  }
101 
102  range_type range_;
103  pointer data_;
104  }; // class Impl
105 
106  template <typename... Ts>
107  struct is_tensor {
108  static constexpr bool value = detail::is_tensor<Ts...>::value ||
109  detail::is_tensor_of_tensor<Ts...>::value;
110  };
111 
112  template <typename U,
113  typename std::enable_if<detail::is_scalar_v<U>>::type* = nullptr>
114  static void default_init(size_type, U*) {}
115 
116  template <typename U,
117  typename std::enable_if<!detail::is_scalar_v<U>>::type* = nullptr>
118  static void default_init(size_type n, U* u) {
119  math::uninitialized_fill_vector(n, U(), u);
120  }
121 
122  std::shared_ptr<Impl> pimpl_;
123  static const range_type empty_range_;
124 
125  public:
126  // Compiler generated functions
127  Tensor() : pimpl_() {}
128  Tensor(const Tensor_& other) : pimpl_(other.pimpl_) {}
129  Tensor(Tensor_&& other) : pimpl_(std::move(other.pimpl_)) {}
130  ~Tensor() {}
131  Tensor_& operator=(const Tensor_& other) {
132  pimpl_ = other.pimpl_;
133  return *this;
134  }
135  Tensor_& operator=(Tensor_&& other) {
136  pimpl_ = std::move(other.pimpl_);
137  return *this;
138  }
139 
141 
145  explicit Tensor(const range_type& range)
146  : pimpl_(std::make_shared<Impl>(range)) {
147  default_init(range.volume(), pimpl_->data_);
148  }
149 
151 
154  template <
155  typename Value,
156  typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<Value, value_type>::value &&
157  detail::is_tensor<Value>::value>::type* = nullptr>
158  Tensor(const range_type& range, const Value& value)
159  : pimpl_(std::make_shared<Impl>(range)) {
160  const size_type n = pimpl_->range_.volume();
161  pointer MADNESS_RESTRICT const data = pimpl_->data_;
162  for (size_type i = 0ul; i < n; ++i)
163  new (data + i) value_type(value.clone());
164  }
165 
167 
170  template <typename Value, typename std::enable_if<
171  detail::is_numeric_v<Value>>::type* = nullptr>
172  Tensor(const range_type& range, const Value& value)
173  : pimpl_(std::make_shared<Impl>(range)) {
174  detail::tensor_init([value]() -> Value { return value; }, *this);
175  }
176 
178  template <typename InIter,
179  typename std::enable_if<
180  TiledArray::detail::is_input_iterator<InIter>::value &&
181  !std::is_pointer<InIter>::value>::type* = nullptr>
182  Tensor(const range_type& range, InIter it)
183  : pimpl_(std::make_shared<Impl>(range)) {
184  size_type n = range.volume();
185  pointer MADNESS_RESTRICT const data = pimpl_->data_;
186  for (size_type i = 0ul; i < n; ++i) data[i] = *it++;
187  }
188 
189  template <typename U>
190  Tensor(const Range& range, const U* u)
191  : pimpl_(std::make_shared<Impl>(range)) {
192  math::uninitialized_copy_vector(range.volume(), u, pimpl_->data_);
193  }
194 
196 
199  template <typename T1,
200  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<T1>::value &&
201  !std::is_same<T1, Tensor_>::value>::type* =
202  nullptr>
203  explicit Tensor(const T1& other)
204  : pimpl_(std::make_shared<Impl>(detail::clone_range(other))) {
205  auto op = [](const numeric_t<T1> arg) -> numeric_t<T1> { return arg; };
206 
207  detail::tensor_init(op, *this, other);
208  }
209 
211 
215  template <typename T1,
216  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<T1>::value>::type* = nullptr>
217  Tensor(const T1& other, const Permutation& perm)
218  : pimpl_(std::make_shared<Impl>(perm * other.range())) {
219  auto op = [](const numeric_t<T1> arg) -> numeric_t<T1> { return arg; };
220 
221  detail::tensor_init(op, perm, *this, other);
222  }
223 
225 
230  template <typename T1, typename Op,
231  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<T1>::value &&
232  !std::is_same<typename std::decay<Op>::type,
233  Permutation>::value>::type* =
234  nullptr>
235  Tensor(const T1& other, Op&& op)
236  : pimpl_(std::make_shared<Impl>(detail::clone_range(other))) {
237  detail::tensor_init(op, *this, other);
238  }

246  template <typename T1, typename Op,
247  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<T1>::value>::type* = nullptr>
248  Tensor(const T1& other, Op&& op, const Permutation& perm)
249  : pimpl_(std::make_shared<Impl>(perm * other.range())) {
250  detail::tensor_init(op, perm, *this, other);
251  }

261  template <typename T1, typename T2, typename Op,
262  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<T1, T2>::value>::type* = nullptr>
263  Tensor(const T1& left, const T2& right, Op&& op)
264  : pimpl_(std::make_shared<Impl>(detail::clone_range(left))) {
265  detail::tensor_init(op, *this, left, right);
266  }
267 
269 
277  template <typename T1, typename T2, typename Op,
278  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<T1, T2>::value>::type* = nullptr>
279  Tensor(const T1& left, const T2& right, Op&& op, const Permutation& perm)
280  : pimpl_(std::make_shared<Impl>(perm * left.range())) {
281  detail::tensor_init(op, perm, *this, left, right);
282  }
283 
284  Tensor_ clone() const {
285  Tensor_ result;
286  if (pimpl_) {
287  result = detail::tensor_op<Tensor_>(
288  [](const numeric_type value) -> numeric_type { return value; },
289  *this);
290  }
291  return result;
292  }
293 
294  template <typename T1,
295  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<T1>::value>::type* = nullptr>
296  Tensor_& operator=(const T1& other) {
297  detail::inplace_tensor_op(
298  [](reference MADNESS_RESTRICT tr,
299  typename T1::const_reference MADNESS_RESTRICT t1) { tr = t1; },
300  *this, other);
301 
302  return *this;
303  }

308  const range_type& range() const {
309  return (pimpl_ ? pimpl_->range_ : empty_range_);
310  }
311 
313 
316  range_type& range() {
317  TA_ASSERT(pimpl_);
318  return pimpl_->range_;
319  }
320 
322 
324  size_type size() const { return (pimpl_ ? pimpl_->range_.volume() : 0ul); }

333  template <typename Ordinal,
334  std::enable_if_t<std::is_integral<Ordinal>::value>* = nullptr>
335  const_reference operator[](const Ordinal ord) const {
336  TA_ASSERT(pimpl_);
337  TA_ASSERT(pimpl_->range_.includes(ord));
338  return pimpl_->data_[ord];
339  }

487 
491  template <typename Archive,
492  typename std::enable_if<madness::archive::is_output_archive<
493  Archive>::value>::type* = nullptr>
494  void serialize(Archive& ar) {
495  if (pimpl_) {
496  ar & pimpl_->range_.volume();
497  ar& madness::archive::wrap(pimpl_->data_, pimpl_->range_.volume());
498  ar & pimpl_->range_;
499  } else {
500  ar& size_type(0ul);
501  }
502  }
503 
505 
509  template <typename Archive,
510  typename std::enable_if<madness::archive::is_input_archive<
511  Archive>::value>::type* = nullptr>
512  void serialize(Archive& ar) {
513  size_type n = 0ul;
514  ar& n;
515  if (n) {
516  std::shared_ptr<Impl> temp = std::make_shared<Impl>();
517  temp->data_ = temp->allocate(n);
518  try {
519  // need to construct elements of data_ using placement new in case its
520  // default ctor is not trivial N.B. for fundamental types and standard
521  // alloc this incurs no overhead (Eigen::aligned_alloc OK also)
522  auto* data_ptr = temp->data_;
523  for (size_type i = 0; i != n; ++i, ++data_ptr)
524  new (static_cast<void*>(data_ptr)) value_type;
525 
526  ar& madness::archive::wrap(temp->data_, n);
527  ar & temp->range_;
528  } catch (...) {
529  temp->deallocate(temp->data_, n);
530  throw;
531  }
532 
533  pimpl_ = temp;
534  } else {
535  pimpl_.reset();
536  }
537  }
538 
540 
542  void swap(Tensor_& other) { std::swap(pimpl_, other.pimpl_); }

544  template <typename Index>
545  detail::TensorInterface<T, BlockRange> block(const Index& lower_bound,
546  const Index& upper_bound) {
547  TA_ASSERT(pimpl_);
548  return detail::TensorInterface<T, BlockRange>(
549  BlockRange(pimpl_->range_, lower_bound, upper_bound), pimpl_->data_);
550  }

558  }

580  Tensor_ permute(const Permutation& perm) const {
581  return Tensor_(*this, perm);
582  }

585 
589  template <typename Index>
590  Tensor_& shift_to(const Index& bound_shift) {
591  TA_ASSERT(pimpl_);
592  pimpl_->range_.inplace_shift(bound_shift);
593  return *this;
594  }
595 
597 
601  template <typename Index>
602  Tensor_ shift(const Index& bound_shift) const {
603  TA_ASSERT(pimpl_);
604  Tensor_ result = clone();
605  result.shift_to(bound_shift);
606  return result;
607  }

706  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
707  Tensor_ scale(const Scalar factor) const {
708  return unary(

750  return binary(

988  template <
989  typename Right, typename Scalar,
990  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value &&
991  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
992  Tensor_& subt_to(const Right& right, const Scalar factor) {
993  return inplace_binary(
994  right, [factor](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT l,
995  const numeric_t<Right> r) { (l -= r) *= factor; });
996  }
997 
999 
1001  Tensor_& subt_to(const numeric_type value) { return add_to(-value); }
1002

1011  template <typename Right,
1012  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
1013  Tensor_ mult(const Right& right) const {
1014  return binary(
1015  right,
1016  [](const numeric_type l, const numeric_t<Right> r) -> numeric_type {
1017  return l * r;
1018  });
1019  }

1029  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
1030  Tensor_ mult(const Right& right, const Permutation& perm) const {
1031  return binary(
1032  right,
1033  [](const numeric_type l, const numeric_t<Right> r) -> numeric_type {
1034  return l * r;
1035  },
1036  perm);
1037  }

1047  template <
1048  typename Right, typename Scalar,
1049  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value &&
1050  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
1051  Tensor_ mult(const Right& right, const Scalar factor) const {
1052  return binary(right,
1053  [factor](const numeric_type l, const numeric_t<Right> r)
1054  -> numeric_type { return (l * r) * factor; });
1055  }

1067  typename Right, typename Scalar,
1068  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value &&
1069  detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
1070  Tensor_ mult(const Right& right, const Scalar factor,
1071  const Permutation& perm) const {
1072  return binary(
1073  right,
1074  [factor](const numeric_type l, const numeric_t<Right> r)
1075  -> numeric_type { return (l * r) * factor; },
1076  perm);
1077  }

1088  const numeric_t<Right> r) { l *= r; });

1105  const numeric_t<Right> r) { (l *= r) *= factor; });

1198  // GEMM operations
1199 
1201 
1210  template <typename U, typename AU, typename V,
1211  typename std::enable_if<!detail::is_tensor_of_tensor<
1212  Tensor_, Tensor<U, AU>>::value>::type* = nullptr>
1213  Tensor_ gemm(const Tensor<U, AU>& other, const V factor,
1214  const math::GemmHelper& gemm_helper) const {
1215  // Check that this tensor is not empty and has the correct rank
1216  TA_ASSERT(pimpl_);
1217  TA_ASSERT(pimpl_->range_.rank() == gemm_helper.left_rank());
1218 
1219  // Check that the arguments are not empty and have the correct ranks
1220  TA_ASSERT(!other.empty());
1221  TA_ASSERT(other.range().rank() == gemm_helper.right_rank());
1222 
1223  // Construct the result Tensor
1224  Tensor_ result(gemm_helper.make_result_range<range_type>(pimpl_->range_,
1225  other.range()));
1226 
1227  // Check that the inner dimensions of left and right match
1228  TA_ASSERT(ignore_tile_position() ||
1229  gemm_helper.left_right_congruent(pimpl_->range_.lobound_data(),
1230  other.range().lobound_data()));
1231  TA_ASSERT(ignore_tile_position() ||
1232  gemm_helper.left_right_congruent(pimpl_->range_.upbound_data(),
1233  other.range().upbound_data()));
1234  TA_ASSERT(gemm_helper.left_right_congruent(pimpl_->range_.extent_data(),
1235  other.range().extent_data()));
1236 
1237  // Compute gemm dimensions
1238  integer m = 1, n = 1, k = 1;
1239  gemm_helper.compute_matrix_sizes(m, n, k, pimpl_->range_, other.range());
1240 
1241  // Get the leading dimension for left and right matrices.
1242  const integer lda =
1243  (gemm_helper.left_op() == madness::cblas::NoTrans ? k : m);
1244  const integer ldb =
1245  (gemm_helper.right_op() == madness::cblas::NoTrans ? n : k);
1246 
1247  math::gemm(gemm_helper.left_op(), gemm_helper.right_op(), m, n, k, factor,
1248  pimpl_->data_, lda, other.data(), ldb, numeric_type(0),
1249  result.data(), n);
1250 
1251 #ifdef TA_ENABLE_TILE_OPS_LOGGING
1252  if (TiledArray::TileOpsLogger<T>::get_instance_ptr() != nullptr &&
1253  TiledArray::TileOpsLogger<T>::get_instance().gemm) {
1254  auto& logger = TiledArray::TileOpsLogger<T>::get_instance();
1255  auto apply = [](auto& fnptr, const Range& arg) {
1256  return fnptr ? fnptr(arg) : arg;
1257  };
1258  auto tformed_left_range =
1259  apply(logger.gemm_left_range_transform, pimpl_->range_);
1260  auto tformed_right_range =
1261  apply(logger.gemm_right_range_transform, other.range());
1262  auto tformed_result_range =
1263  apply(logger.gemm_result_range_transform, result.range());
1264  if ((!logger.gemm_result_range_filter ||
1265  logger.gemm_result_range_filter(tformed_result_range)) &&
1266  (!logger.gemm_left_range_filter ||
1267  logger.gemm_left_range_filter(tformed_left_range)) &&
1268  (!logger.gemm_right_range_filter ||
1269  logger.gemm_right_range_filter(tformed_right_range))) {
1270  logger << "TA::Tensor::gemm=: left=" << tformed_left_range
1271  << " right=" << tformed_right_range
1272  << " result=" << tformed_result_range << std::endl;
1273  if (TiledArray::TileOpsLogger<T>::get_instance()
1274  .gemm_print_contributions) {
1275  if (!TiledArray::TileOpsLogger<T>::get_instance().gemm_printer) {
1276  // must use custom printer if result's range transformed
1277  if (!logger.gemm_result_range_transform)
1278  logger << result << std::endl;
1279  else
1280  logger << make_map(result.data(), tformed_result_range)
1281  << std::endl;
1282  } else {
1283  TiledArray::TileOpsLogger<T>::get_instance().gemm_printer(
1284  *logger.log, tformed_left_range, this->data(),
1285  tformed_right_range, other.data(), tformed_right_range,
1286  result.data());
1287  }
1288  }
1289  }
1290  }
1291 #endif // TA_ENABLE_TILE_OPS_LOGGING
1292 
1293  return result;
1294  }
1295 
1297 
1335  template <typename U, typename AU, typename V, typename AV, typename W,
1336  typename std::enable_if<!detail::is_tensor_of_tensor<
1337  Tensor_, Tensor<U, AU>, Tensor<V, AV>>::value>::type* = nullptr>
1338  Tensor_& gemm(const Tensor<U, AU>& left, const Tensor<V, AV>& right,
1339  const W factor, const math::GemmHelper& gemm_helper) {
1340  // Check that this tensor is not empty and has the correct rank
1341  TA_ASSERT(pimpl_);
1342  TA_ASSERT(pimpl_->range_.rank() == gemm_helper.result_rank());
1343 
1344  // Check that the arguments are not empty and have the correct ranks
1345  TA_ASSERT(!left.empty());
1346  TA_ASSERT(left.range().rank() == gemm_helper.left_rank());
1347  TA_ASSERT(!right.empty());
1348  TA_ASSERT(right.range().rank() == gemm_helper.right_rank());
1349 
1350  // Check that the outer dimensions of left match the corresponding
1351  // dimensions in result
1352  TA_ASSERT(ignore_tile_position() ||
1353  gemm_helper.left_result_congruent(left.range().lobound_data(),
1354  pimpl_->range_.lobound_data()));
1355  TA_ASSERT(ignore_tile_position() ||
1356  gemm_helper.left_result_congruent(left.range().upbound_data(),
1357  pimpl_->range_.upbound_data()));
1358  TA_ASSERT(gemm_helper.left_result_congruent(left.range().extent_data(),
1359  pimpl_->range_.extent_data()));
1360 
1361  // Check that the outer dimensions of right match the corresponding
1362  // dimensions in result
1363  TA_ASSERT(ignore_tile_position() ||
1364  gemm_helper.right_result_congruent(
1365  right.range().lobound_data(), pimpl_->range_.lobound_data()));
1366  TA_ASSERT(ignore_tile_position() ||
1367  gemm_helper.right_result_congruent(
1368  right.range().upbound_data(), pimpl_->range_.upbound_data()));
1369  TA_ASSERT(gemm_helper.right_result_congruent(right.range().extent_data(),
1370  pimpl_->range_.extent_data()));
1371 
1372  // Check that the inner dimensions of left and right match
1373  TA_ASSERT(ignore_tile_position() ||
1374  gemm_helper.left_right_congruent(left.range().lobound_data(),
1375  right.range().lobound_data()));
1376  TA_ASSERT(ignore_tile_position() ||
1377  gemm_helper.left_right_congruent(left.range().upbound_data(),
1378  right.range().upbound_data()));
1379  TA_ASSERT(gemm_helper.left_right_congruent(left.range().extent_data(),
1380  right.range().extent_data()));
1381 
1382  // Compute gemm dimensions
1383  integer m, n, k;
1384  gemm_helper.compute_matrix_sizes(m, n, k, left.range(), right.range());
1385 
1386  // Get the leading dimension for left and right matrices.
1387  const integer lda =
1388  (gemm_helper.left_op() == madness::cblas::NoTrans ? k : m);
1389  const integer ldb =
1390  (gemm_helper.right_op() == madness::cblas::NoTrans ? n : k);
1391 
1392  // may need to split gemm into multiply + accumulate for tracing purposes
1393 #ifdef TA_ENABLE_TILE_OPS_LOGGING
1394  {
1395  const bool twostep =
1396  TiledArray::TileOpsLogger<T>::get_instance().gemm &&
1397  TiledArray::TileOpsLogger<T>::get_instance().gemm_print_contributions;
1398  std::unique_ptr<T[]> data_copy;
1399  size_t tile_volume;
1400  if (twostep) {
1401  tile_volume = range().volume();
1402  data_copy = std::make_unique<T[]>(tile_volume);
1403  std::copy(pimpl_->data_, pimpl_->data_ + tile_volume, data_copy.get());
1404  }
1405  math::gemm(gemm_helper.left_op(), gemm_helper.right_op(), m, n, k, factor,
1406  left.data(), lda, right.data(), ldb,
1407  twostep ? numeric_type(0) : numeric_type(1), pimpl_->data_, n);
1408 
1409  if (TiledArray::TileOpsLogger<T>::get_instance_ptr() != nullptr &&
1410  TiledArray::TileOpsLogger<T>::get_instance().gemm) {
1411  auto& logger = TiledArray::TileOpsLogger<T>::get_instance();
1412  auto apply = [](auto& fnptr, const Range& arg) {
1413  return fnptr ? fnptr(arg) : arg;
1414  };
1415  auto tformed_left_range =
1416  apply(logger.gemm_left_range_transform, left.range());
1417  auto tformed_right_range =
1418  apply(logger.gemm_right_range_transform, right.range());
1419  auto tformed_result_range =
1420  apply(logger.gemm_result_range_transform, pimpl_->range_);
1421  if ((!logger.gemm_result_range_filter ||
1422  logger.gemm_result_range_filter(tformed_result_range)) &&
1423  (!logger.gemm_left_range_filter ||
1424  logger.gemm_left_range_filter(tformed_left_range)) &&
1425  (!logger.gemm_right_range_filter ||
1426  logger.gemm_right_range_filter(tformed_right_range))) {
1427  logger << "TA::Tensor::gemm+: left=" << tformed_left_range
1428  << " right=" << tformed_right_range
1429  << " result=" << tformed_result_range << std::endl;
1430  if (TiledArray::TileOpsLogger<T>::get_instance()
1431  .gemm_print_contributions) {
1432  if (!TiledArray::TileOpsLogger<T>::get_instance()
1433  .gemm_printer) { // default printer
1434  // must use custom printer if result's range transformed
1435  if (!logger.gemm_result_range_transform)
1436  logger << *this << std::endl;
1437  else
1438  logger << make_map(pimpl_->data_, tformed_result_range)
1439  << std::endl;
1440  } else {
1441  TiledArray::TileOpsLogger<T>::get_instance().gemm_printer(
1442  *logger.log, tformed_left_range, left.data(),
1443  tformed_right_range, right.data(), tformed_right_range,
1444  pimpl_->data_);
1445  }
1446  }
1447  }
1448  }
1449 
1450  if (twostep) {
1451  for (size_t v = 0; v != tile_volume; ++v) {
1452  pimpl_->data_[v] += data_copy[v];
1453  }
1454  }
1455  }
1456 #else // TA_ENABLE_TILE_OPS_LOGGING
1457  math::gemm(gemm_helper.left_op(), gemm_helper.right_op(), m, n, k, factor,
1458  left.data(), lda, right.data(), ldb, numeric_type(1),
1459  pimpl_->data_, n);
1460 #endif // TA_ENABLE_TILE_OPS_LOGGING
1461 
1462  return *this;
1463  }
1464 
1465  // Reduction operations
1466 
1468 
1473  value_type trace() const {
1474  TA_ASSERT(pimpl_);
1475 
1476  // Get pointers to the range data
1477  const size_type n = pimpl_->range_.rank();
1478  const size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower =
1479  pimpl_->range_.lobound_data();
1480  const size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const upper =
1481  pimpl_->range_.upbound_data();
1482  const size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const stride =
1483  pimpl_->range_.stride_data();
1484 
1485  // Search for the largest lower bound and the smallest upper bound
1486  size_type lower_max = 0ul,
1487  upper_min = std::numeric_limits<size_type>::max();
1488  for (size_type i = 0ul; i < n; ++i) {
1489  const size_type lower_i = lower[i];
1490  const size_type upper_i = upper[i];
1491 
1492  lower_max = std::max(lower_max, lower_i);
1493  upper_min = std::min(upper_min, upper_i);
1494  }
1495 
1496  value_type result = 0;
1497 
1498  if (lower_max < upper_min) {
1499  // Compute the first and last ordinal index
1500  size_type first = 0ul, last = 0ul, trace_stride = 0ul;
1501  for (size_type i = 0ul; i < n; ++i) {
1502  const size_type lower_i = lower[i];
1503  const size_type stride_i = stride[i];
1504 
1505  first += (lower_max - lower_i) * stride_i;
1506  last += (upper_min - lower_i) * stride_i;
1507  trace_stride += stride_i;
1508  }
1509 
1510  // Compute the trace
1511  const value_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const data = pimpl_->data_;
1512  for (; first < last; first += trace_stride) result += data[first];
1513  }
1514 
1515  return result;
1516  }
1517 
1519 
1530  template <typename ReduceOp, typename JoinOp, typename Scalar>
1531  decltype(auto) reduce(ReduceOp&& reduce_op, JoinOp&& join_op,
1532  Scalar identity) const {
1533  return detail::tensor_reduce(reduce_op, join_op, identity, *this);
1534  }
1535 
1537 
1549  template <typename Right, typename ReduceOp, typename JoinOp, typename Scalar,
1550  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
1551  decltype(auto) reduce(const Right& other, ReduceOp&& reduce_op,
1552  JoinOp&& join_op, Scalar identity) const {
1553  return detail::tensor_reduce(reduce_op, join_op, identity, *this, other);
1554  }
1555 
1557 
1559  numeric_type sum() const {
1560  auto sum_op = [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
1561  const numeric_type arg) { res += arg; };
1562  return reduce(sum_op, sum_op, numeric_type(0));
1563  }
1564 
1566 
1568  numeric_type product() const {
1569  auto mult_op = [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
1570  const numeric_type arg) { res *= arg; };
1571  return reduce(mult_op, mult_op, numeric_type(1));
1572  }
1573 
1575 
1577  scalar_type squared_norm() const {
1578  auto square_op = [](scalar_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
1579  const numeric_type arg) {
1580  res += TiledArray::detail::norm(arg);
1581  };
1582  auto sum_op = [](scalar_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res, const scalar_type arg) {
1583  res += arg;
1584  };
1585  return reduce(square_op, sum_op, scalar_type(0));
1586  }
1587 
1589 
1593  template <typename ResultType = scalar_type>
1594  ResultType norm() const {
1595  return std::sqrt(static_cast<ResultType>(squared_norm()));
1596  }
1597 
1599 
1601  template <typename Numeric = numeric_type>
1602  numeric_type min(
1603  typename std::enable_if<
1604  detail::is_strictly_ordered<Numeric>::value>::type* = nullptr) const {
1605  auto min_op = [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
1606  const numeric_type arg) { res = std::min(res, arg); };
1607  return reduce(min_op, min_op, std::numeric_limits<numeric_type>::max());
1608  }
1609 
1611 
1613  template <typename Numeric = numeric_type>
1614  numeric_type max(
1615  typename std::enable_if<
1616  detail::is_strictly_ordered<Numeric>::value>::type* = nullptr) const {
1617  auto max_op = [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
1618  const numeric_type arg) { res = std::max(res, arg); };
1619  return reduce(max_op, max_op, std::numeric_limits<scalar_type>::min());
1620  }
1621 
1623 
1625  scalar_type abs_min() const {
1626  auto abs_min_op = [](scalar_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
1627  const numeric_type arg) {
1628  res = std::min(res, std::abs(arg));
1629  };
1630  auto min_op = [](scalar_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res, const scalar_type arg) {
1631  res = std::min(res, arg);
1632  };
1633  return reduce(abs_min_op, min_op, std::numeric_limits<scalar_type>::max());
1634  }
1635 
1637 
1639  scalar_type abs_max() const {
1640  auto abs_max_op = [](scalar_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
1641  const numeric_type arg) {
1642  res = std::max(res, std::abs(arg));
1643  };
1644  auto max_op = [](scalar_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res, const scalar_type arg) {
1645  res = std::max(res, arg);
1646  };
1647  return reduce(abs_max_op, max_op, scalar_type(0));
1648  }
1649 
1651 
1657  template <typename Right,
1658  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
1659  numeric_type dot(const Right& other) const {
1660  auto mult_add_op = [](numeric_type& res, const numeric_type l,
1661  const numeric_t<Right> r) { res += l * r; };
1662  auto add_op = [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
1663  const numeric_type value) { res += value; };
1664  return reduce(other, mult_add_op, add_op, numeric_type(0));
1665  }
1666 
1668 
1674  template <typename Right,
1675  typename std::enable_if<is_tensor<Right>::value>::type* = nullptr>
1676  numeric_type inner_product(const Right& other) const {
1677  auto mult_add_op = [](numeric_type& res, const numeric_type l,
1678  const numeric_t<Right> r) {
1679  res += TiledArray::detail::inner_product(l, r);
1680  };
1681  auto add_op = [](numeric_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT res,
1682  const numeric_type value) { res += value; };
1683  return reduce(other, mult_add_op, add_op, numeric_type(0));
1684  }
1685 
1686 }; // class Tensor
1687 
1688 template <typename T, typename A>
1689 const typename Tensor<T, A>::range_type Tensor<T, A>::empty_range_;
1690 
1691 template <typename T, typename A>
1692 bool operator==(const Tensor<T, A>& a, const Tensor<T, A>& b) {
1693  return a.range() == b.range() &&
1694  std::equal(a.data(), a.data() + a.size(), b.data());
1695 }
1696 template <typename T, typename A>
1697 bool operator!=(const Tensor<T, A>& a, const Tensor<T, A>& b) {
1698  return !(a == b);
1699 }
1700 
1701 // specialize TiledArray::detail::transform for Tensor
1702 namespace detail {
1703 template <typename T, typename A>
1704 struct transform<Tensor<T, A>> {
1705  template <typename Op, typename T1>
1706  Tensor<T, A> operator()(Op&& op, T1&& t1) const {
1707  return Tensor<T, A>(std::forward<T1>(t1), std::forward<Op>(op));
1708  }
1709  template <typename Op, typename T1>
1710  Tensor<T, A> operator()(Op&& op, const Permutation& perm, T1&& t1) const {
1711  return Tensor<T, A>(std::forward<T1>(t1), std::forward<Op>(op), perm);
1712  }
1713  template <typename Op, typename T1, typename T2>
1714  Tensor<T, A> operator()(Op&& op, T1&& t1, T2&& t2) const {
1715  return Tensor<T, A>(std::forward<T1>(t1), std::forward<T2>(t2),
1716  std::forward<Op>(op));
1717  }
1718  template <typename Op, typename T1, typename T2>
1719  Tensor<T, A> operator()(Op&& op, const Permutation& perm, T1&& t1,
1720  T2&& t2) const {
1721  return Tensor<T, A>(std::forward<T1>(t1), std::forward<T2>(t2),
1722  std::forward<Op>(op), perm);
1723  }
1724 };
1725 } // namespace detail
